title: internet diary 2
body:
the internet diary part 2: rebirth

ok so you saw the articles in the other entry i made to solve the mystery of that girl who was killed. so today I was on my searching website called Moogle (google for mysteries) and found this

selling a little girl for snuff films and red rooms

1000 dollars for 1 little girl

meet at 1233333 rainbow street

im going to rainbow street to find her

update

he threw me in a cell with her but i see a gun i can grab the gun and kill him

i told her "HEY YOU FHDIOSOHFKIJDHSFIODSJfIOSdifoSDfioJ"

"wha"

"u suck'

"why"

"i have a shovel we can dig out" she said

i dag out I DAG OUT

Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School Kore wa omona yōgi-shadesu School ERROR ERROR ERROR

something bad happened

she died

she fell into a hole full of man eating rats that love to kill people oh and I lost my trench coat that is the biggest loss here I made a grave for the trench coat
wait what
why is everything going w31rd on d1s c0mpu13r

AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

oh god its over

ok ok ok

i got hired by the s.b.m.a.o.d.p (super bad mystery agency of dumb people) now weeeeeeeeeeeeeee

wait I heard something outside let me check
